MyAccountPracticeAutomationPage.description: This page allows users to log in to their existing account or register for a new account.

elements.name: Username or email address input
elements.description: Input field for username or email address for login.

elements.name: Password input (Login)
elements.description: Input field for password for login.

elements.name: Login button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Remember me checkbox
elements.description: Checkbox to remember the user's login details.

elements.name: Lost your password link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the password reset page.

elements.name: Email address input (Register)
elements.description: Input field for email address for registration.

elements.name: Password input (Register)
elements.description: Input field for password for registration.

elements.name: Register button
elements.description: Button to submit the registration form.

assertions: Page title contains 'My Account - Practice Automation'
